title: Custardy French-Style Soft Scrambled Eggs Recipe
full_text:
Custardy French-Style Soft Scrambled Eggs Recipe
Jump to recipe
Cook
10 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
10 mins
Serves
2
to 3 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
6
large
eggs,
beaten
1/4
teaspoon
kosher salt
2 tablespoons (
30
g
)
unsalted butter
4
tablespoons
(60ml) cream or
milk
(optional; see notes)
Freshly
ground
white or
black pepper
Directions
In a small saucepan, combine eggs, salt, butter, and milk or cream, if using. Set over low heat and cook, whisking constantly, until eggs thicken to a custardy consistency, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat, season with pepper, and serve right away.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Special Equipment
Small saucepan,
whisk
Notes
Cream or milk will make slightly richer, moister eggs, but is not required.
